verses.text: \w And|strong="H3117"\w* Hiram king \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Tyre sent \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5647"\w* \w unto|strong="H4503"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*; \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* heard \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* anointed \w him|strong="H5647"\w* king \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w room|strong="H5066"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father: \w for|strong="H5704"\w* Hiram \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w ever|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lover \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w David|strong="H3117"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* sent \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Hiram, saying,

Thou knowest how \w that|strong="H1241"\w* David my father could not build \w a|strong="H3068"\w* house \w for|strong="H1241"\w* \w the|strong="H3967"\w* name \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* his God \w for|strong="H1241"\w* \w the|strong="H3967"\w* wars which \w were|strong="H6629"\w* about him on every side, until \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* put them under \w the|strong="H3967"\w* soles \w of|strong="H6629"\w* his feet.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God \w hath|strong="H4428"\w* given \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w rest|strong="H7965"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w side|strong="H5676"\w*; \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* neither adversary, \w nor|strong="H3588"\w* evil occurrence.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w*, behold, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* purpose \w to|strong="H5704"\w* build \w a|strong="H3068"\w* house \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* spake \w unto|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* father, saying, \w Thy|strong="H8010"\w* son, whom \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H3427"\w* \w thy|strong="H8010"\w* throne \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w thy|strong="H8010"\w* \w room|strong="H8478"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* build \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* name.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* command \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* they cut \w me|strong="H1961"\w* cedar-trees \w out|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Lebanon; \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* servants \w shall|strong="H6571"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w thy|strong="H8010"\w* servants; \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* thee hire \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w thy|strong="H8010"\w* servants according \w to|strong="H1961"\w* all \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt say: \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* knowest \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* among \w us|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* knoweth how \w to|strong="H1961"\w* cut timber \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Sidonians.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w came|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* pass, when Hiram heard \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* rejoiced \w greatly|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, Blessed \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w hath|strong="H4428"\w* given \w unto|strong="H1697"\w* David \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wise son \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* great \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* Hiram sent \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Solomon, saying, \w I|strong="H8033"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* heard \add the message\add* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* hast sent \w unto|strong="H4941"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*: \w I|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* do all thy desire concerning timber \w of|strong="H4725"\w* cedar, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* concerning timber \w of|strong="H4725"\w* fir.

\w My|strong="H5414"\w* servants \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Lebanon \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* rafts \w to|strong="H5921"\w* go \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* shalt \w appoint|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* broken \w up|strong="H5414"\w* there, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* shalt \w receive|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*; \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* shalt accomplish \w my|strong="H5414"\w* desire, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* food \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* household.

\w So|strong="H7235"\w* Hiram \w gave|strong="H7235"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* timber \w of|strong="H1121"\w* cedar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* timber \w of|strong="H1121"\w* fir according \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* desire.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Solomon \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* Hiram twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H1121"\w* wheat \w for|strong="H8034"\w* food \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* household, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* twenty measures \w of|strong="H1121"\w* pure oil: \w thus|strong="H1961"\w* \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* Solomon \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Hiram \w year|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H8034"\w* \w year|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2568"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H1696"\w* Solomon wisdom, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H2568"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w*; \w and|strong="H2568"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* peace between Hiram \w and|strong="H2568"\w* Solomon; \w and|strong="H2568"\w* \w they|strong="H1696"\w* two \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* league together.

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* Solomon raised \w a|strong="H3068"\w* levy \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* Israel; \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* levy \w was|strong="H6086"\w* thirty thousand men.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* sent \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* Lebanon, ten thousand \w a|strong="H3068"\w* month \w by|strong="H3605"\w* courses; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* month \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* Lebanon, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* two months \w at|strong="H4428"\w* home: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Adoniram \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w subject|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* taskwork.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* threescore \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w ten|strong="H1732"\w* thousand \w that|strong="H3588"\w* bare burdens, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* fourscore thousand \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* hewers \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mountains;

besides \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*’s chief officers \w that|strong="H8010"\w* were \w over|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* work, three thousand \w and|strong="H7971"\w* three hundred, who bare rule \w over|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* people \w that|strong="H8010"\w* wrought \w in|strong="H8010"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* work.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w* commanded, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* hewed \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w great|strong="H6440"\w* stones, costly stones, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* foundation \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* wrought stone.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Solomon’s builders \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Hiram’s builders \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Gebalites \w did|strong="H3068"\w* fashion \w them|strong="H5117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* prepared \w the|strong="H3068"\w* timber \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* stones \w to|strong="H3068"\w* build \w the|strong="H3068"\w* house.
